title: 56: Ski Resorts in Burlington, VT
description:
This week, we rewrite The Grinch, repurpose Charles Dickens' A Christmas Carol, and share other valuable pieces of media in the form of Yelp reviews. We hope this episode doesn't leave your puggle craving human flesh!
Go watch our latest YouTube video to see us reveal the man behind the intro: https://youtu.be/l8Qzn-kW2wY
Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/beachtoosandy for a monthly livestream Q&A! 
Buy our merch! https://store.dftba.com/collections/beach-too-sandy-water-too-wet
Logo by Courtney DeKorte. Theme by Mavus White.
Music by PSOVOD and tyops.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
